games.name: Brookhaven RP
games.description: Role-playing town simulation with customization, vehicles, houses, and social interactions.

features.name: Avatar Customization
features.description: Extensive character customization options
features.technicalNotes: Clothing, hair, accessories, animations. Use catalog system with premium items.

features.name: Vehicle System
features.description: Drivable cars, boats, and helicopters
features.technicalNotes: Physics-based driving. Spawn system. Garage and ownership system.

features.name: Property System
features.description: Houses and buildings players can own and customize
features.technicalNotes: Instance-based interiors. Furniture placement. Premium houses with Robux.

games.name: Tower of Hell
games.description: Fast-paced obby/parkour game with randomly generated tower challenges. Simple but highly addictive.

features.name: Procedural Generation
features.description: Randomly generated tower sections each round
features.technicalNotes: Pool of tower sections. Random selection algorithm. Balance difficulty curve.

features.name: Leaderboard System
features.description: Real-time competitive rankings
features.technicalNotes: Track fastest completion times. Display top players. Reset each round.

features.name: Mutators/Modifiers
features.description: Special game modes that change physics or rules
features.technicalNotes: Examples: Low gravity, speed boost, inverted controls. VIP-exclusive modes.

games.name: Phantom Forces
games.description: Tactical FPS with realistic weapons, customization, and various game modes. Often compared to Call of Duty.

features.name: Weapon Customization
features.description: Deep gun customization with attachments
features.technicalNotes: Optics, barrels, grips, ammo types. Stat modifications. Unlock system.

features.name: Ballistics System
features.description: Realistic bullet physics and damage
features.technicalNotes: Bullet drop, penetration, damage falloff. Raycast-based hit detection.

features.name: Progression System
features.description: Rank-based weapon and attachment unlocks
features.technicalNotes: XP from kills, objectives, score. Weapon unlocks at specific ranks.

games.name: Adopt Me!
games.description: Virtual pet adoption and nurturing game with trading, mini-games, and social features. One of the most successful games on Roblox.

features.name: Pet Collection System
features.description: Extensive pet collection with different rarities and types
features.technicalNotes: Use rarity tiers (Common, Uncommon, Rare, Ultra-Rare, Legendary). Implement egg hatching mechanics with probabilities.

features.name: Trading System
features.description: Player-to-player trading with security measures
features.technicalNotes: Implement trade windows, confirmation dialogs, trade history, and scam prevention.

features.name: Housing System
features.description: Customizable houses and furniture
features.technicalNotes: Furniture placement system with snap-to-grid and rotation.

games.name: Blox Fruits
games.description: One Piece-inspired RPG with devil fruit powers, grinding mechanics, PvP combat, and progression systems.

features.name: Devil Fruit System
features.description: Collectible powers with unique abilities
features.technicalNotes: Each fruit has unique move sets. Implement spawn mechanics and fruit trading.

games.name: Fish It! ðŸŸ
games.description: Viral fishing simulator with simple tap-to-catch mechanics, rare fish collection, and social competition. Currently the #1 game on Roblox by concurrent players.

features.name: One-Tap Fishing
features.description: Simple tap mechanic to catch fish with RNG rarity
features.technicalNotes: Tap timing affects catch rates. Premium rods increase rare fish chance.

features.name: Fish Collection
features.description: Hundreds of fish with tiered rarity (Common to Mythic)
features.technicalNotes: Fish have rarity, value, and display mechanics. Collection bonuses.

games.name: Sol's RNG
games.description: Pure RNG/luck simulator where players roll for rare 'auras'. Zero skill barrier - anyone can get lucky. Capitalizes on gambling psychology and flex culture.

features.name: Aura Rolling System
features.description: Roll for random auras with extreme rarity tiers
features.technicalNotes: Rarity from 1:10 to 1:10,000,000+. Luck boosts sold for Robux.

features.name: Aura Display
features.description: Visible auras around player as status symbols
features.technicalNotes: Particle effects, glow, and size scale with rarity.

games.name: Dress To Impress
games.description: Timed competitive fashion game with player voting. Massive social validation loops and creator expression. Consistently top 10 by concurrent players.

features.name: Timed Outfit Creation
features.description: Limited time to create themed outfits
features.technicalNotes: 5-10 minute rounds. Theme announced at start. Premium items give advantage.

features.name: Player Voting System
features.description: Players vote on each other's outfits to determine winner
features.technicalNotes: Anonymous voting. Points based on votes received. Anti-gaming measures.

games.name: RIVALS
games.description: High-stakes competitive FPS with skill-based matchmaking. Monetizes through skins, crates, and prestige items. Growing esports potential.

features.name: Ranked Matchmaking
features.description: ELO-based competitive matchmaking system
features.technicalNotes: Seasonal resets. Rank rewards. Anti-smurf detection.

games.name: The Strongest Battlegrounds
games.description: Peak anime combat game with visceral feedback. Characters from popular anime with unique movesets. Focus on feel-good combat and skill expression.

features.name: Character Movesets
features.description: Unique abilities and combos per character
features.technicalNotes: Each character has 4-6 unique moves. Combo chains. Special ultimates.

games.name: Pet Simulator 99
games.description: The gold standard of pet simulators. Infinite progression, massive trading economy, and exclusive eggs that drive high-ticket sales consistently.

features.name: Exclusive Egg Sales
features.description: Limited-time eggs with exclusive pets at premium prices
features.technicalNotes: $50-100+ eggs. FOMO mechanics. Limited quantity available.

games.name: Bee Swarm Simulator
games.description: Deep complex mechanics hidden behind simple appearance. Rewards long-term planning and consistent daily logins. Extremely loyal player base.

games.name: Escape Tsunami For Brainrots!
games.description: Viral meme-based survival game using Gen Alpha 'brainrot' characters. High-stakes escape gameplay with humorous elements. Currently top 3 by concurrent players.

features.name: Tsunami Escape
features.description: Timed escape from rising water/tsunami
features.technicalNotes: Simple obby mechanics. Rising water timer. Multiple escape paths.

games.name: ðŸ‰ Dragon Legends
games.description: Epic dragon collection and breeding RPG. Collect rare dragons, breed for unique hybrids, battle in arenas, trade with players, and join clans for exclusive rewards. Built with our roblox-core library.

features.name: Dragon Breeding System
features.description: Breed dragons with genetic inheritance for rare traits and mutations
features.technicalNotes: Genetics system with dominant/recessive traits. Mutation chances. Breeding cooldowns.

features.name: Elemental Battle System
features.description: Rock-paper-scissors elemental advantages in dragon battles
features.technicalNotes: Fire > Nature > Water > Fire. Special abilities per element.

features.name: Clan System
features.description: Join clans for perks, boss raids, and social features
features.technicalNotes: Uses roblox-core clans module. Contributions, ranks, and exclusive rewards.

features.name: Daily Rewards with Streaks
features.description: Login daily for escalating rewards with VIP multipliers
features.technicalNotes: Uses roblox-core dailyRewards module. 7-day cycle with milestone bonuses.

requirements.title: Implement Dragon Breeding System
requirements.description: Create a breeding mechanic where players can combine dragons to create new offspring with mixed traits

requirements.title: Trading System Security Audit
requirements.description: Review and harden the trading system against duplication exploits

requirements.title: Daily Reward Calendar UI
requirements.description: Design and implement the daily reward calendar with progressive rewards

settings.name: Double XP Weekend
settings.description: Enable double XP for weekend events

tutorials.title: Welcome!
tutorials.instruction: Welcome to Dragon Legends! Tap anywhere to continue.

tutorials.title: Your First Dragon
tutorials.instruction: This is your starter dragon! Tap on it to see its stats.

tutorials.title: Battle Arena
tutorials.instruction: Tap the Battle button to enter your first fight!

tutorials.title: Breeding Basics
tutorials.instruction: Select two dragons to breed them together.

documentation.title: Dragon Legends GDD
documentation.content:
# Dragon Legends

## Overview
Dragon Legends is a collection and breeding game where players collect, train, and breed dragons.

## Core Loop
1. Collect dragons through eggs
2. Train dragons in battles
3. Breed dragons for new variants
4. Trade with other players

documentation.title: Economy Design
documentation.content:
# Economy Design

## Currencies
- **Coins**: Soft currency, earned through gameplay
- **Gems**: Premium currency

## Sinks & Faucets
- Faucets: Daily rewards, battles, achievements
- Sinks: Breeding, upgrades, cosmetics

games.name: ðŸŽ£ Lucky Fish Legends
games.description: Cast your luck. Catch legends. Flex forever. A fishing + RNG hybrid combining Fish It!'s viral loop with Sol's RNG monetization. One-tap fishing for fish with extreme rarities (1:10M) and visible aura effects.
strengths: Combines #1 game loop with highest margin model

features.name: One-Tap Fishing
features.description: Simple tap mechanic to catch fish with RNG rarity
features.technicalNotes: Tap timing affects catch rates. Premium rods increase rare fish chance. Viral clip potential.

features.name: Extreme Rarity Tiers
features.description: Fish rarities from 1:10 to 1:10,000,000 inspired by Sol's RNG
features.technicalNotes: Rarity tiers: Common (1:10), Rare (1:100), Epic (1:1000), Legendary (1:10000), Mythic (1:100000), Godly (1:1M), Kraken (1:10M)

features.name: Visible Aura Effects
features.description: Rare fish display bioluminescent auras for flex culture
features.technicalNotes: Particle effects scale with rarity. Glows visible to all players. Status symbol.

features.name: Luck Boost Gamepasses
features.description: 2x, 5x, 10x luck multipliers for Robux
features.technicalNotes: Permanent and timed boosts. Stack with events. Primary revenue driver.

features.name: Trading System
features.description: Player-to-player fish trading for economy and retention
features.technicalNotes: Uses roblox-core trading module. Trade windows, history, scam prevention.

games.name: ðŸª™ Coin Collector
games.description: Simple coin collection game used as our roblox-ts learning project and testing ground. Basic mechanics but fully functional with our core library integration.

games.name: ðŸŽ£ Lucky Fish Legends
games.description: A relaxing yet competitive fishing simulator. Cast your line, catch rare fish, complete your collection, and compete in tournaments!

features.name: Fishing Core Loop
features.description: Cast, wait, reel - the fundamental fishing mechanic with timing minigames
features.technicalNotes: Uses fishingSystem.ts from roblox-core. Cast time affected by rod and bait bonuses.
features.codeSnippets: castLine(state, location) â†’ reelIn(state, species, locations)

features.name: Fish Collection Album
features.description: Track all 150+ fish species with rarity tiers and personal records
features.technicalNotes: getCollectionProgress() tracks discovered species. Personal records stored in recordCatches.

features.name: Fishing Locations
features.description: 7 unique locations from Starter Pond to The Abyss, each with unlock levels
features.technicalNotes: SAMPLE_LOCATIONS defines zones. Location rarityBoost affects fish quality.

features.name: Rod & Bait System
features.description: Upgrade rods for faster catches and better rarity. Baits boost specific fish.
features.technicalNotes: SAMPLE_RODS (5 tiers) and SAMPLE_BAITS (4 types). Premium rods available for Robux.

features.name: Fish Quality Grades
features.description: Each catch rated Poor/Normal/Good/Perfect affecting sell price
features.technicalNotes: rollQuality() determines grade. Perfect = 2.5x sell price.

rewards.name: New Species Bonus
rewards.description: Double XP for catching a species for the first time

rewards.name: Perfect Catch
rewards.description: 2.5x sell multiplier for perfect quality fish

mechanics.name: Rarity Rolling
mechanics.description: Each cast rolls rarity: Common 50%, Uncommon 25%, Rare 15%, Epic 7%, Legendary 2.5%, Mythic 0.5%
mechanics.technicalNotes: rollRarity() applies location and bait bonuses. Higher tier locations boost rare chances.

mechanics.name: Weight Variance
mechanics.description: Fish weight varies by species. Heavier = more coins. Personal records tracked.
mechanics.technicalNotes: calculateWeight() uses baseWeight +/- weightVariance. Level bonus adds 2% per level.

successFactors.description: Players driven to catch all 150+ species

requirements.title: Core Fishing Loop
requirements.description: Cast line, wait for bite, reel in fish with timing minigame

requirements.title: Collection Album UI
requirements.description: Grid view of all species with silhouettes for undiscovered

requirements.title: 7 Fishing Zones
requirements.description: Build starter pond through abyss with unique aesthetics

requirements.title: Rod Upgrade Shop
requirements.description: 5 rod tiers purchasable with coins and premium currency

settings.description: Base probability for each fish rarity tier
Default time in milliseconds to catch a fish

tutorials.title: Welcome to Lucky Fish Legends!
tutorials.description: Tap the Cast button to throw your line into the water

tutorials.title: Wait for a Bite
tutorials.description: Watch the bobber. When it dips, tap Reel to catch!

tutorials.title: Your First Catch!
tutorials.description: Congratulations! Check your Collection to see your discovery.

documentation.title: Fishing System Architecture
documentation.content: Uses libs/roblox-core/src/gameplay/fishingSystem.ts. Key exports: castLine(), reelIn(), getCollectionProgress()

documentation.title: Monetization Strategy
documentation.content: Core game free. Premium rods, special baits, and VIP location access drive revenue. Battle Pass for seasonal content.

products.name: Dragon Legends
products.description: Epic dragon collection game with breeding, battling, and trading. Collect 500+ unique dragons across elemental types.
strengths: Unique dragon theme differentiates from pet simulators
Breeding system adds depth beyond collection
Epic visual style appeals to older kids/teens

products.name: Lucky Fish Legends
products.tagline: Cast your line, catch your fortune!
products.description: Relaxing fishing simulator with rare fish collection, aquarium building, and underwater exploration.
strengths: Relaxing gameplay appeals to casual audience
Lower barrier to entry than combat games
weaknesses: Fishing niche smaller than pet collecting
Less viral potential than competitive games
uniqueSellingPoints: Rare legendary fish with special abilities

products.name: Family Quest
products.description: Cooperative family adventure game with quests, puzzles, and rewards that parents and kids complete together.
strengths: Underserved family co-op niche on Roblox
Parents want to play WITH kids safely

products.name: Fish It! ðŸŸ
products.description: Currently #1 viral game on Roblox. Simple tap-to-catch fishing with rare fish collection and leaderboards.

products.name: Adopt Me!
products.description: One of the most successful Roblox games ever. Pet collection, trading, housing, and social features.

products.name: Blox Fruits
products.description: One Piece inspired RPG with grinding, PvP combat, fruit powers, and raids. Massive teen audience.

products.name: Brookhaven RP
products.description: Open-world roleplay with houses, vehicles, and social interactions. Massive casual audience.

products.name: Sol's RNG
products.description: Roll for rare auras with extreme rarity tiers. Zero skill barrier - pure gambling psychology.

products.name: Dress To Impress

products.name: The Strongest Battlegrounds

products.name: Claude
products.description: Constitutional AI assistant focused on being helpful, harmless, and honest. Long context, coding, and analysis.

products.name: ChatGPT
products.description: AI chatbot powered by GPT-4 for conversation, writing, coding, and image generation.
strengths: Market leader with massive user base

products.name: Cursor
products.description: VS Code fork with deep AI integration for code completion, chat, and intelligent editing.
strengths: VS Code familiarity - zero learning curve

products.name: GitHub Copilot
products.description: AI coding assistant integrated into popular IDEs for code completion and suggestions.
weaknesses: Plugin model less integrated than Cursor

products.name: Perplexity AI
products.description: AI-powered answer engine combining LLMs with real-time web search for sourced answers.

products.name: Midjourney
products.description: AI image generation through Discord with artistic and photorealistic capabilities.

products.name: Replit Agent
products.description: AI agent that can build entire applications from natural language descriptions.

products.name: v0 by Vercel
products.description: AI-powered UI generation tool that creates React components from natural language.

products.name: Devin
products.description: Autonomous AI software engineer that can plan, code, debug, and deploy software.
uniqueSellingPoints: Uses tools like a human would

products.name: Google Data Analytics Certificate
products.tagline: Launch your career in data analytics
products.description: Professional certificate program by Google covering data analysis, visualization, and SQL.

products.name: Notion
products.description: All-in-one workspace combining notes, docs, wikis, and databases.

products.name: Life360
products.description: Family locator and safety app with location sharing, crash detection, and driving insights.

products.name: OurHome
products.description: Chore and reward system for families with task assignments and point tracking.

products.name: Pet Simulator X
products.description: Roblox game where players collect coins, hatch eggs, and collect pets with trading.
strengths: Massive variety of pets with clear rarity tiers
Regular weekly updates keep content fresh
Strong social features - trading creates economy

companies.name: Coursera
companies.description: Online learning platform partnering with universities and companies to offer courses, certificates, and degrees.

companies.name: Udemy
companies.description: Marketplace for online learning with 200,000+ courses taught by expert instructors.

companies.name: Anthropic
companies.description: AI safety company building reliable, interpretable AI systems.
companies.tagline: AI research company focused on safety

companies.name: OpenAI
companies.description: AI research and deployment company with mission to ensure AGI benefits humanity.

companies.name: Notion
companies.description: All-in-one workspace for notes, docs, wikis, and project management.
companies.tagline: One tool for your whole team

companies.name: Obsidian
companies.description: Knowledge base that works on local Markdown files with powerful linking.
companies.tagline: A second brain, for you, forever

companies.name: Life360
companies.description: Family safety and location sharing platform with 50M active families.

companies.name: Cozi
companies.description: Family organizer app for shared calendars, lists, and meal planning.

features.name: Collection System
features.description: Players collect items, pets, fish, dragons, etc. Core loop for most simulators.
features.notes: Every successful simulator has collection at its core. Key differentiator is WHAT you collect.
features.bestPracticeExample: Pet Simulator X has masterful egg mechanics

features.name: Player Trading
features.description: Peer-to-peer item/pet trading system. Creates player economy and social bonds.
features.notes: Trading creates emergent economy. Need scam protection. Consider trade history.
features.bestPracticeExample: Adopt Me trading with confirmation screens

features.name: Breeding/Fusion System
features.description: Combine two items to create new variants. Adds depth and rarity creation.
features.notes: Breeding adds genetic interest. Fusion simpler to implement. Both create item sinks.

features.name: Evolution/Leveling
features.description: Items/pets grow stronger over time or through actions. Progression hook.
features.notes: Evolution creates attachment. Visible transformations are highly satisfying.

features.name: Daily Rewards
features.description: Login rewards that escalate over consecutive days. Core retention mechanic.
features.notes: Standard feature. 7-day cycles work well. Big reward on day 7/30. Reset on miss is controversial.

features.name: Limited-Time Events
features.description: Seasonal/holiday events with exclusive rewards. FOMO driver.
features.notes: Plan event calendar 6 months ahead. Holiday events are expected. Exclusive items drive urgency.
features.bestPracticeExample: Adopt Me holiday events are legendary

features.name: Quest/Mission System
features.description: Objectives to complete for rewards. Provides direction and goals.
features.notes: Daily + Weekly + Seasonal quests. Tiered difficulty. Clear rewards displayed upfront.

features.name: Achievement System
features.description: Long-term goals with badges/titles. Completionist appeal.
features.notes: Categories: Collection, Progression, Social, Special. Visible badges in profile.

features.name: Leaderboards
features.description: Competitive rankings for various metrics. Social comparison driver.
features.notes: Global, friends, weekly, all-time. Multiple categories. Visible rewards for top spots.

features.name: Premium Currency
features.description: Robux-purchasable currency for in-game purchases. Primary revenue stream.
features.notes: Standard on Roblox. Consider dual currency (soft + hard). Bundles with bonuses.

features.name: Gacha/Egg System
features.description: Random reward boxes with varying rarities. High-margin monetization.
features.notes: Show odds (Roblox requires). Tiered eggs. Pity system optional. Visible rolling animation.

features.name: Battle/Season Pass
features.description: Seasonal progression with free and premium tracks. Recurring revenue.
features.notes: Free track must be compelling. Premium track = exclusive items. XP from gameplay.

features.name: VIP/Gamepass
features.description: One-time purchase for permanent perks. Lower commitment than subscriptions.
features.notes: Multiple tiers possible. Clear value proposition. Visible VIP badge.

features.name: Multiplayer/Co-op
features.description: Play with other players in shared world. Core Roblox expectation.
features.notes: Roblox is inherently multiplayer. Even single-player games benefit from presence.

features.name: Guilds/Clans
features.description: Player groups with shared goals and perks. Social retention driver.
features.notes: Guild wars, shared goals, chat, ranks. Creates social obligation to return.

features.name: Friend Features
features.description: Friend-specific bonuses, invites, and features. Organic growth driver.
features.notes: Friend referral bonuses. Friend leaderboards. Play together bonuses.

features.name: Chat System
features.description: In-game text communication. Roblox provides base, but can enhance.
features.notes: Roblox chat is default. Consider quick chat, emotes, stickers.

features.name: Customization/Cosmetics
features.description: Player/pet appearance customization. Self-expression driver.
features.notes: High monetization potential. Regular new items. Seasonal exclusives.

features.name: Housing/Decorating
features.description: Player-owned spaces they can customize. Deep engagement feature.
features.notes: High dev cost but high engagement. Furniture = monetization. Tours create social.

features.name: Multiple Worlds/Areas
features.description: Different themed areas to explore. Content expansion path.
features.notes: New worlds for updates. Each world = new items. Progression gating.

features.name: PvP Combat
features.description: Player versus player battles. Competitive engagement driver.
features.notes: Not for all games. Requires careful balance. Arenas separate from main game.

features.name: PvE/Boss Battles
features.description: Cooperative battles against AI enemies. Social bonding through challenge.
features.notes: Raid bosses create events. Scaling difficulty. Loot tables.

features.name: Minigames
features.description: Short competitive games within main game. Session variety.
features.notes: Racing, fishing tournaments, etc. Break up main loop.

features.name: Parental Controls
features.description: Features for parent oversight and child safety.
features.notes: Roblox provides base. Consider spending limits, play time, chat restrictions.

features.name: Content Moderation
features.description: Systems to prevent abuse, scams, and inappropriate content.
features.notes: Report systems. Trade confirmations. Chat filtering. Age gates.

features.name: Tutorial/Onboarding
features.description: First-time user experience guiding new players.
features.notes: Critical for retention. Show value in 30 seconds. Skip option for returning.

features.name: Mobile Optimization
features.description: Touch controls and UI optimized for mobile play.
features.notes: 60%+ of Roblox is mobile. Touch-first design. Simple UI.

features.name: Auto-Save/Cloud Save
features.description: Automatic progress saving. Expected standard.
features.notes: Roblox DataStore handles this. Implement properly. Backup systems.

features.name: Settings/Options
features.description: Player-configurable game settings.
features.notes: Graphics, sound, controls, notifications. Accessibility options.

product-features.whyHave: Core loop - collecting dragons is the game
Dragon trading creates economy and social

product-features.whyNotHave: Not core to dragon game, maybe dragon lair later
